element.name: Curing Moonlight
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You create drop of liquid moonlight over the targeted creature. The drop lays onto the creature's skin or may enter their body to heal. The target regains hit points equal to 3d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier and has advantage on it's next attack. This spell has no effect on constructs.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment. This spell has no effect on evil or undead creatures.

element.name: Lunar Sphere
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You point at a location within range, and a glowing 1-foot-diameter ball of radiant energy streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9d6 radiant damage and cannot become invisible. On a successful save, a creature takes half the damage and can turn invisible.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 4th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment.

element.name: Embracing Moonlight
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You call out to the Moon and infuse a creature with magical moonlight to slightly transform the creature in a guardian of the Moon. The transformation lasts until the spell ends. The creature’s eyes begin to glow, and the hair appears as if made from water, and gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Magical darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
Weapon attacks are considered magical and deal an extra 1d6 radiant damage on a hit.

description.p: The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment. This spell has no effect on evil or undead creatures.

element.name: Lunar Beam
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You point on a target within range and unleash a lunatic beam to strike it with immense force. The target can be a creature, an object, or a creation of magical force, such as the wall created by wall of force. On hit, the target takes 8d8 radiant or force damage (your choice) and must make a charisma saving throw. On a failed save the next attack against the target has advantage. Alternatively, the next saving throw of the target has disadvantage, whichever situation is first.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, roll an additional 1d8 for each slot level above the 5th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment.

element.name: Lunar Grasp
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: A shining figure glowing with moonlight appears at your shoulder, and reaches out to a creature within range. The creature must make a Charisma saving throw. If they fail, the grasp cleaves into their soul, inflicting 10d6 radiant damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 30 hit points or fewer, they are instantly slain. If they succeed they receive half damage and do not get executed. Once the attack is made, the figure vanishes. If the target has a natural 20 on its saving throw, it receives no damage. On a natural 1 instead, the damage is doubled.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a slot of 6th level or higher, the radiant damage increases by 1d6 and the hit point threshold increases by 5 per slot level above 5th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment.

element.name: Lunar Cure
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: A wave of healing moonlight washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each target regains hit points equal to 4d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier and has advantage on it's next attack. This spell has no effect on constructs.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 6th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment. This spell has no effect on evil or undead creatures.

element.name: Lunar Vengeance
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You summon a massive amount of moonlight that surrounds you, sparkling the air around your body and infusing you with glowing strength. Whenever a creature within 120 feet hits you with an attack or spell a spark of moonlight attempts to strike back. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes 5d6 radiant damage on a failed save. While Lunar Vengeance is active you have advantage on attack rolls and spell attack rolls that deal radiant damage.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the radiant damage increases by 1d6 per slot level above 7th.
The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment.

element.name: Lunar Embrace
element.supports: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock

description.p: You call out to the Moon and infuse some creatures with magical moonlight. Choose a number of creatures up to your spellcasting ability modifier and transform them in guardians of the Moon. The transformation lasts until the spell ends. The creatures eyes begin to glow, and their hair appears as if made from water, and gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Magical darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
Weapon attacks are considered magical and deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage on a hit.
Spectral wings appear on their back, giving them a flying speed of 40 feet.
They have a +3 bonus to AC.

description.p: The caster of this spell must be a follower of Selûne and must not be undead nor have an evil alignment. This spell has no effect on evil or undead creatures.
